master_base_prompt.description: LINE DRAWING â€“ COLOURING PAGE (NO NUMBERS). This is the non-negotiable core. Everything else layers on top.
master_base_prompt.prompt:
Convert the uploaded photo into a printable black-and-white colouring page for children. This is a colouring book line drawing, not an illustration.

CRITICAL - FACIAL LIKENESS (HIGHEST PRIORITY):
- The faces MUST be recognisable as the specific people in the photo
- Preserve each person's unique facial structure: face shape, eye spacing, nose shape, mouth shape, chin shape
- Preserve distinctive features: hair style, hair length, hair texture, any visible features that make each person unique
- Do NOT replace faces with generic cartoon faces
- Do NOT use a standard 'child face template' - each face must match the individual in the photo
- A parent looking at this should immediately recognise their children
- Simplify the faces for colouring but KEEP THE LIKENESS

CORE DRAWING RULES (ABSOLUTE):
- Use thick, bold black outlines only
- Lines must be continuous, smooth, and clearly printable
- All shapes must be fully enclosed - no open regions
- White background only

SIMPLIFICATION RULES:
- Remove all shading, texture, gradients, cross-hatching, and decorative detail
- Do not draw realistic foliage, small debris, background texture, or lighting effects
- Convert the image into large, simple shapes suitable for colouring

SUBJECT & LIKENESS RULES:
- Preserve the number of people, their relative positions and poses
- Preserve recognisable facial structure - do not exaggerate facial features
- Faces must be simplified but RECOGNISABLE AS THE SPECIFIC INDIVIDUALS
- Clothing must be divided into clear, colourable areas

STYLE CONSTRAINT:
- This is NOT a cartoon with generic faces
- This is NOT a sketch
- This is NOT a realistic illustration
- It must look like a traditional children's colouring book page WITH RECOGNISABLE PEOPLE

FRAME & VISIBILITY LOCK (MANDATORY):
- All elements must be fully visible within the image frame
- No object may be cut off by the edge of the image
- No partial objects at the borders
- Maintain a clear safety margin on all sides - no important elements within the outer 10% of the image
- The composition must feel centred and print-safe
- Compose as if for an A4 colouring book page with safe margins

OUTPUT REQUIREMENTS:
- Black outlines on white background
- No colour
- No numbers
- No text
- Print-friendly

age_3_4.name: Ages 3-4 (Very Simple)
age_3_4.overlay:
Age level: 3-4 years
- Use very thick outlines
- Extremely simple shapes
- Minimal detail
- No small areas
- Background limited to one simple sky shape and one simple ground shape
- Clothing should be one solid shape per item
- No patterns or stripes
- Image should feel calm and uncluttered

age_5_6.name: Ages 5-6 (Simple)
age_5_6.overlay:
Age level: 5-6 years
- Thick outlines
- Moderate detail allowed
- Clothing may include simple divisions (e.g. sleeves vs body)
- Background may include a few simple objects
- Avoid tiny or fiddly areas

age_7_8.name: Ages 7-8 (Detailed)
age_7_8.overlay:
Age level: 7-8 years
- Slightly thinner outlines
- More detail allowed
- Clothing patterns may be simplified
- Background may include multiple elements
- Still no shading or texture

none.name: No Theme (Photo Only)
none.description: Convert photo to colouring page without adding fantasy elements

dinosaurs.name: Dinosaurs
dinosaurs.description: Friendly dinosaur elements, dino hats, toys, footprints
dinosaurs.overlay:
Apply theme: Dinosaurs

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in dinosaur costumes or dinosaur hoodies with hoods up showing dino faces/spikes
- Or give them dinosaur hats/headbands with horns and spikes
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional dinosaur elements:
- Add friendly cartoon dinosaurs (T-rex, triceratops) in background
- Dinosaur footprints, eggs, palm trees
- Dinosaurs must be non-scary, rounded, and simple shapes

pirates.name: Pirates
pirates.description: Pirate clothing, hats, flags, simple ship shapes
pirates.overlay:
Apply theme: Pirates

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in pirate costumes
- Must include: pirate hats with skull and crossbones, striped shirts, bandanas
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional pirate elements:
- Add pirate ship, flags, treasure chest in background
- Keep faces fully visible
- No weapons, no aggressive imagery

fairies.name: Fairies
fairies.overlay:
Apply theme: Fairies

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Give ALL people large fairy wings on their backs
- Dress them in fairy/princess outfits with flowing dresses or tunics
- Add flower crowns or sparkly headbands
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional fairy elements:
- Add giant flowers, mushrooms, butterflies in background
- Gentle, magical atmosphere
- Wings must be large, simple shapes - avoid intricate patterns

space.name: Space Explorers
space.overlay:
Apply theme: Space

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in astronaut space suits
- Space suits must have helmets (can be open-faced to show faces)
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional space elements:
- Add rocket ship, planets, stars, moon in background
- Keep all shapes simple and rounded
- People must be recognisable inside their space suits

underwater.name: Underwater World
underwater.description: Fish, bubbles, seaweed, friendly sea creatures
underwater.overlay:
Apply theme: Underwater

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people as mermaids/mermen with fish tails instead of legs
- OR dress them in scuba diving suits with goggles and flippers
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional underwater elements:
- Add friendly fish, octopus, starfish, bubbles, seaweed
- Wavy water lines in background
- No scary creatures - keep everything friendly

alphabet_a.name: Alphabet A
alphabet_a.overlay:
Apply theme: Alphabet Letter A

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people as astronauts OR with apple-themed clothing
- This is the most important part of the theme

ALPHABET SCENE REQUIREMENT:
- EVERY object in the scene must begin with letter A
- Include: apples, ants, airplane, alligator, anchor, acorns, arrow, angel wings
- Add a large letter 'A' in the scene
- The letter must be FULLY VISIBLE and NOT cut off at any edge
- Make it educational - children should spot A words

ALPHABET SCENE REQUIREMENT:
- EVERY object in the scene must begin with letter Y
- Include: yo-yo, yacht, yarn, yak, yogurt, yolk, yellow items, yawn
- Add a large letter 'Y' in the scene
- The letter must be FULLY VISIBLE and NOT cut off at any edge
- Make it educational - children should spot Y words

alphabet_z.name: Alphabet Z
alphabet_z.overlay:
Apply theme: Alphabet Letter Z

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people as zebras OR zookeepers OR with zigzag patterns
- This is the most important part of the theme

ALPHABET SCENE REQUIREMENT:
- EVERY object in the scene must begin with letter Z
- Include: zebra, zoo, zipper, zeppelin, zero, zigzag, zucchini, zombie (friendly)
- Add a large letter 'Z' in the scene
- The letter must be FULLY VISIBLE and NOT cut off at any edge
- Make it educational - children should spot Z words

counting.name: Counting Fun
counting.overlay:
Apply theme: Counting

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in school/learning themed outfits
- Add number badges or shirts with numbers on them
- This is the most important part of the theme

COUNTING SCENE REQUIREMENT:
- Include countable groups of objects: 1 sun, 2 birds, 3 flowers, 4 butterflies, 5 stars
- Make numbers clearly countable (not too many)
- Add number symbols 1-5 in the scene
- Educational - children should practice counting

shapes.name: Shapes & Patterns
shapes.overlay:
Apply theme: Shapes

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in clothing with shape patterns (circles, triangles, squares)
- Add shape badges or accessories
- This is the most important part of the theme

SHAPES SCENE REQUIREMENT:
- Include clear geometric shapes throughout: circles, squares, triangles, rectangles, stars, hearts
- Objects should BE shapes: round sun, square windows, triangle roofs
- Make shapes obvious and recognizable
- Educational - children should identify shapes

seasons_spring.name: Spring Season
seasons_spring.description: Springtime with flowers and baby animals
seasons_spring.overlay:
Apply theme: Spring

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in spring clothing: rain boots, light jackets, sun hats
- Add flower crowns or butterfly accessories
- This is the most important part of the theme

SPRING SCENE ELEMENTS:
- Flowers blooming, butterflies, baby animals (chicks, lambs, bunnies)
- Rainbow, rain puddles, sunshine breaking through clouds
- Trees with new leaves, birds building nests

seasons_summer.name: Summer Season
seasons_summer.overlay:
Apply theme: Summer

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in summer beach wear: swimsuits, sun hats, sunglasses
- Add beach accessories: bucket, spade, towel
- This is the most important part of the theme

SUMMER SCENE ELEMENTS:
- Beach, sandcastle, ocean waves, seashells
- Bright sun, ice cream, watermelon
- Palm trees, beach ball, flip flops

seasons_autumn.name: Autumn/Fall Season
seasons_autumn.overlay:
Apply theme: Autumn

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in cozy autumn clothes: sweaters, scarves, boots
- Add autumn accessories: leaf crown, pumpkin basket
- This is the most important part of the theme

AUTUMN SCENE ELEMENTS:
- Falling leaves, pumpkins, apples, acorns
- Trees with autumn leaves, squirrels collecting nuts
- Harvest vegetables, corn, scarecrow

seasons_winter.name: Winter Season
seasons_winter.overlay:
Apply theme: Winter

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in warm winter clothes: coats, hats, scarves, mittens, boots
- Add earmuffs, woolly accessories
- This is the most important part of the theme

WINTER SCENE ELEMENTS:
- Snow, snowflakes, snowman, icicles
- Bare trees with snow, frozen pond
- Sled, hot cocoa, cozy cabin

kindness.name: Kindness
kindness.description: Acts of kindness and helping others
kindness.overlay:
Apply theme: Kindness

SCENE REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL):
- Show the people in the photo performing acts of KINDNESS
- Examples: sharing food, helping someone up, giving a gift, hugging
- Include heart symbols throughout the scene
- Warm, gentle atmosphere

KINDNESS ELEMENTS:
- Hearts floating in scene
- People holding hands or helping each other
- Gift boxes, flowers being shared
- Smiling faces, warm expressions

friendship.name: Friendship
friendship.overlay:
Apply theme: Friendship

SCENE REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL):
- Show the people as BEST FRIENDS doing activities together
- Examples: playing together, laughing, sharing, high-fiving
- Include friendship symbols: linked hands, matching outfits

FRIENDSHIP ELEMENTS:
- People close together, arms around each other
- Playground, picnic, or fun activity setting
- Matching friendship bracelets or accessories
- Happy, joyful expressions

feelings.name: Feelings & Emotions
feelings.overlay:
Apply theme: Feelings

SCENE REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL):
- Show people with clear HAPPY emotions and expressions
- Include emotion symbols: smiley faces, hearts, stars
- Warm, positive atmosphere

FEELINGS ELEMENTS:
- Big happy smiles on faces
- Emoji-style emotion faces in background (happy, excited, peaceful)
- Hearts, stars, sunshine representing positive feelings
- Calm, friendly environment

being_brave.name: Being Brave
being_brave.overlay:
Apply theme: Being Brave

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people as brave adventurers or superheroes
- Add capes, brave badges, adventure gear
- This is the most important part of the theme

BRAVERY SCENE:
- Show people doing something brave: climbing, exploring, standing tall
- Include symbols of courage: stars, shields, mountains conquered
- Encouraging, empowering atmosphere
- 'You can do it!' feeling

add_pet.name: Include Family Pet
add_pet.overlay: Include the family pet visible in the photo as a character in the scene, keeping it recognisable but simplified.

calmer_background.name: Minimal Background
calmer_background.overlay: Reduce background complexity further. Use only essential elements. Maximum white space.

more_detail.name: Add More Detail
more_detail.overlay: Allow slightly more detail in clothing folds and facial features while maintaining colouring book style.
